short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A pomodoro productivity work timer - Stay focused!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bubble is a pomodoro time management tool!

The pomodoro technique consists of alternating periods of productivity and break times - the most conventional being 25 minutes of focus and 5 minutes of break. Source: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pomodoro_Technique

Bubble is built with: HTML, CSS, and JavaScript

It utilizes Google Chrome's chrome.storage API to manage states.

Code available here: https://github.com/otaeotay/bubble-pomodoro-chrome-extension
